title: Software Engineer (Security Leadership) - Enterprise Trust
description:
We're building products to power the future of work in the metaverse - enabling a world where you can collaborate and feel present with your teammates regardless of your physical location.

Enabling the metaverse for businesses poses unique challenges and one of our focuses is on enabling our products to build deep trust amongst businesses and end users. Our work spans everything from the core data and product models underlying how users can interact through to data security, privacy and protection from bad actors.

We are seeking an experienced Software Engineer to join our teams building the core technology that enables businesses and users to trust our products for the future of work. Want to solve unique, large scale, highly complex technical problems that can change the way we all work? Join us!
key_qualifications:
Experience building security products and processes to protect enterprise assets
Experience leading projects with company/industry-wide impact
Deep experience communicating and working across functions to drive solutions
Significant experience in mentoring/influencing senior engineers across organizations
Proven track record of planning multi-year roadmap in which shorter-term projects ladder to the long-term vision
Experience in driving large cross-functional/industry-wide engineering efforts
Expert level programming experience
Significant experience with building large-scale applications and operating at scale
Extensive experience with web or mobile server & client technologies
preferred_qualifications:
B.S. Computer Science or related field
Experience building and scaling large products or systems
responsibilities:
Set clear guardrails to ensure all work products nail enterprise security expectations
Effectively communicate complex features and systems in detail
Understand infosec industry & company-wide trends to help assess & develop new technologies
Partner & collaborate with organization leaders to help improve the level of performance of the team & organization
Identify new opportunities for the larger organization & influence the appropriate people for staffing/prioritizing these new ideas
Create products and features that build trust in work products
Lead long term technical vision and roadmap for large cross-company efforts
